short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor changes in public Google Sheets with real-time notifications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sheets Monitor is a powerful tool designed to help you track changes in public Google Sheets effortlessly. With real-time notifications, you’ll always stay updated on the latest modifications without manually refreshing or checking for updates.

Key Features:
 • Monitor changes in specified public Google Sheets.
 • Highlight recent cell changes for easy identification of modifications.
 • Customize the layout to suit your workflow and preferences.
 • Receive real-time browser notifications when changes occur.
 • Easy setup and intuitive interface.

Permissions:
Sheets Monitor Pro requires access to public Google Sheets and uses notifications to alert you of changes in real-time. All monitored data remains secure and private on your device.
